data.name: Shadow Fear™ Chapter 0 DLC
data.detailed_description:
This DLC include : Chapter 0 : The first night & The Horde Mode.

In the first one called Chapter 0 : The first night, you will
see what happened to Catherine the sister of Nathan on the
first night she went to Lencour mountain... This is Chapter 0!

In the second game mode called : The Horde Mode, you will
try to survive five 3min rounds with only the items you can get
by collecting coins and opening chest... You can be lucky and have
bonus powers such as : Boost Bonus, Ghost Bonus and Coins Bonus...

Good Luck!

*If you have any problem installing this DLC uninstall the game and reinstall it at the same time as the DLC, it should fix it.*
*The same process is needed to change the game language.*

data.short_description: In this DLC you will be able to play 2 mode. The first one is to see what happened to Catherine the sister of Nathan on the first night she went to Lencour mountain... This is Chapter 0! And the other mode is the Horde Mode, you will try to survive five 3min rounds with only the items you can get by collecting coins and opening chest...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD Athlon™ II (K10)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 400 series, AMD Radeon™ HD 5000 series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

data.legal_notice: This game is the propriety of Wathitdew Record™. All assets used in this game are all handmade, purchased, free or are all ok to be used as stated by their creator from where they been downloaded. All due credits are at the end of the game. Have a great time playing our game!

content_descriptors.notes: This is a survival horror fps game so there will be zombies, blood, gore and gun but the game graphics are more cartoony than realistic so it seem less gore than some other realistic horror game...
